titles.title: Veterinary Medicine Loan Repayment Program Enhancement Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for an exclusion for assistance provided to participants in certain veterinary student loan repayment or forgiveness programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/13/2013--Introduced. Veterinary Medicine Loan Repayment Program Enhancement Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income payments under the federal veterinary medicine loan repayment program or any other state loan repayment or forgiveness program that is intended to provide for increased access to veterinary services in such state.
